name: Dank Memer Economy Edition
description:
Here's how to play!

After 1-2 hours of work, I finally present you Dank Memer Bot - Economy Edition! Please read the commands section before commenting on what should I do. Also before you ask any questions, make sure you read the questions section. Thank you! 

I am going to add a command where you can bet money, a command where you can rob real-time online players, and a new game where you can fish, hunt, and post memes online :D
